title: S15 Ep48: Supernatural News/ParaShare: Punched By A Ghost Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/ParaShare: Punched By A Ghost Edition
description:
Darkness Radio Supernatural News / ParaShare Punched by a Ghost Edition!

Dave & Tim explore the supernatural this week with the help of special guests Aaron Sagers and Gabe Roth as we discuss celebrity ghost encounters & UFO sightings, AI Robotic Insects Swarms are coming and there is NOTHING Tim can do about it, Demon Dolls, Spooky Schools and YOUR personal encounters today!

To submit your strange paranormal evidence to Gabe Roth for an upcoming program email the evidence, yours story and your contact info to MyParanormalEvidence@gmail.com

Check out Aaron Sagers article on Ace Frehley here: https://bit.ly/2N7Hll3

Visit Aaron Sagers here: www.ParanormalPopCluture.com

Support our sponsors for great deals!

Go to Bombas.com/darkness today to shop the Pride Collection and get 20% off your first order.
